name: Fallen (itch) (Take Down Games)
description: Please don't think the thumbnail is the game,I needed a thumbnail that's all I had,anyways this is my first attempt at a game,its pretty bad but I am proud of it if you have any feedback I would highly appreciate it,the game has some lore that you need to figure out yourself,but the game play is simple,a left and d right,e to pause and un pause,p to halve the speed and r to double it,the goal is to get the highest score,enjoy.
